title: San Juan County, Washington - Private Property

sections.title: Farm House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** 260833006000 (23.74 acres - Shady Cove LLC)

### Building Details
- **Type:** Residential
- **Square Footage:** [SF]
- **Year Built:** [Year]
- **Bedrooms/Bathrooms:** [Number]
- **Construction Type:** Wood frame
- **Roof Type/Age:** [Type/Year installed]
- **Foundation Type:** [Type]
- **Current Use:** [Primary residence, Guest house, Rental, etc.]
- **Occupancy Status:** [Occupied/Vacant]

### Systems & Utilities
- **Heating:** Electric baseboard heating (multiple zones)
- **Septic:** Septic system with pump
- **Electrical:** Electrical panel with complete circuit directory
- **Water Heater:** Bradford White (25 years old - **CRITICAL: URGENT REPLACEMENT NEEDED**)

### Appliances & Equipment
| Item | Brand/Model | Age/Condition | Notes |
|------|-------------|---------------|-------|
| Refrigerator | LG | 10-15 years old | Functional |
| Range | Premier | Unknown | Electric |
| Water Heater | Bradford White MI50S6DS21 | 25 years old (Feb 2001) | **CRITICAL FAILURE RISK** - S/N: ZB2783563. 50 Gallon. Immediate replacement required. |

### Critical Maintenance Alert: Water Heater
The water heater is **more than double** its expected lifespan. At 25 years old, it represents an **extremely high risk** of:
1. **Catastrophic tank failure and flooding** - could cause thousands in water damage
2. **Complete loss of hot water** without warning
3. **Significant energy waste** - costing extra on every utility bill
4. **Safety hazards** - potential electrical or pressure issues

**Immediate Actions Until Replacement:**
- Check daily for leaks around the base
- Listen for unusual noises (rumbling, popping from sediment)
- Monitor hot water performance
- Consider placing a water alarm or drip pan under unit
- Know where your water shutoff valve is located

**Replacement Priority:**
- This should be your **#1 priority** for the farmhouse
- Get quotes from licensed plumbers immediately
- Consider upgrading to tankless or heat pump water heater for long-term energy savings
- Budget for professional installation (electrical 240V and plumbing required)

sections.title: Lighthouse Point Beach House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** 260833006000 (23.74 acres - Shady Cove LLC)

### Building Details
- **Type:** Residential / Guest House
- **Setting:** Nestled in a wooded area near the beach
- **Exterior:** Wood siding, blends with natural surroundings
- **Access:** Gravel path/driveway

### Systems & Utilities
- **Main Water Shutoff Valve:**
    - **Location:** Exterior access box near the main entry, beneath the covered area by the "Lighthouse Point" sign.
    - **Access:** Wooden cover over concrete/wooden access box.
    - **Valve Type:** Ball valve (Blue handle).
    - **Operation:**
        - **ON:** Handle is parallel to the pipe.
        - **OFF:** Handle is perpendicular (at a right angle) to the pipe.
    - **Emergency Procedure:** Turn handle 90 degrees to shut off water flow.

### Maintenance Notes
- **Clear Access Box:** The valve access box has accumulated leaves and debris. For emergency situations, this MUST be kept clear.
- **Test Valve Annually:** Ensure the shutoff valve operates smoothly and completely closes water flow.
- **Mark Location:** Consider adding cleaner marking on the access box for quick identification during emergencies.
- **Exterior:** Monitor wood siding for moss or weather damage due to wooded/shaded location.

### Appliances & Equipment
| Item | Brand/Model | Age/Condition | Notes |
|------|-------------|---------------|-------|
| Refrigerator | LG LRBP1031T | ~19 years old (2007 model) | **Replacement Recommended** - Nearing end of life. |
| Range | Bosch Electric Range | Good Condition | Stainless steel, ceramic cooktop, convection oven. |
| Dishwasher | Bosch 300 Series | ~7 years old (2019 model) | Good condition. |
| Washer | Maytag MHW8200FC0 | ~8 years old (2018 model) | Good condition. |
| Dryer | Maytag MED8200FC2 | ~8 years old (2018 model) | Good condition. |
| Water Heater | Bradford White | 22 years old (2004 model) | **CRITICAL FAILURE RISK** - Exceeds 8-12 year lifespan. Immediate replacement required. |

### Critical Maintenance Alert: Beach House Water Heater
The Beach House water heater is **22 years old**, which is significantly past its expected lifespan.
**Risks:**
1. **Leakage/Flooding:** High risk of tank failure.
2. **Efficiency:** Likely operating at reduced efficiency.
**Action Required:**
- **Inspect Immediately:** Check for rust or moisture at the base.
- **Plan Replacement:** Schedule replacement ASAP to avoid emergency failure.

**Appliance Maintenance:**
- **Range:** Use specific ceramic cooktop cleaner to avoid scratching. Run self-cleaning cycle 2-3 times per year.
- **Refrigerator:** Monitor cooling performance due to age. Vacuum coils annually to extend life.
- **Laundry:** Clean dryer lint trap after every use. Inspect washer hoses annually for cracks.
